oai_dc:dc.dc:description: dressée d'après le Salnamé 1899/1317 par R. Huber.
Covers Turkey, Lebanon, Crete and portions of Israel, Syria, Iraq, Iran,
Includes index and tables with population statistics.
Insets: Crete -- [Vilayets Andrinople, Salonique, Monastir, Janina, Uskub, Scoutari, Constantinople] -- [Beyrouth] -- [Basra].
